OOC: Rauq basically refused me an answer, Rudra said
o.k. and all the other council members seem to have
dissapeared. For now we can forget about Optimus Fury
o.k. pretend he never existed.

BIC:  A shuttle approaches Earth.  A small bot is at
the controls.  Behind him is a miniture Vector Sigma
connected through the Matrix to the main one.
